00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : Hydrodynamics
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00013 
00014 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00028 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 
00030  SUBROUTINE Hydrodynamics
00031 
00032 ! Common Variables
00033  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00034  USE Domain,    ONLY : inv12, ni, xmax, xmin, ymax, ymin
00035  USE FluidParams
00036  USE LBMParams, ONLY : Cs_sq, fbar, gbar
00037  IMPLICIT NONE
00038 
00039 ! Local Variables
00040  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js
00041  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: invRho, lapRho, gradRhoSqX, gradRhoSqY
00042  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradRhoXX2, gradRhoXY2, gradRhoYX2, gradRhoYY2
00043 
00044 
00045 !--------- Calculate the density -----------------------------------------------
00046  DO j = ymin, ymax
00047    DO i = xmin, xmax
00048      rho(i,j) = fbar(i,j,0) + fbar(i,j,1) + fbar(i,j,2) + fbar(i,j,3) &
00049               + fbar(i,j,4) + fbar(i,j,5) + fbar(i,j,6) + fbar(i,j,7) &
00050               + fbar(i,j,8)
00051    END DO
00052  END DO
00053 
00054 !--------- Differential terms for the stress form of the interfacial force -----
00055  DO j = ymin, ymax
00056    DO i = xmin, xmax
00057      ie = ni(i,j,1)
00058      jn = ni(i,j,2)
00059      iw = ni(i,j,3)
00060      js = ni(i,j,4)
00061 
00062 ! Gradient of the density rho
00063      gradRhoX(i,j) = ( 4.D0*( rho(ie,j ) - rho(iw,j ) ) + rho(ie,jn) &
00064                    - rho(iw,js) + rho(ie,js) - rho(iw,jn) )*inv12
00065 
00066      gradRhoY(i,j) = ( 4.D0*( rho(i ,jn) - rho(i ,js) ) + rho(ie,jn) &
00067                    - rho(iw,js) + rho(iw,jn) - rho(ie,js) )*inv12
00068 
00069 ! Square of the density gradient (components and full)
00070      gradRhoXX(i,j) = gradRhoX(i,j)*gradRhoX(i,j)
00071      gradRhoXY(i,j) = gradRhoX(i,j)*gradRhoY(i,j)
00072      gradRhoYY(i,j) = gradRhoY(i,j)*gradRhoY(i,j)
00073      gradRhoSq(i,j) = gradRhoXX(i,j) + gradRhoYY(i,j)
00074 
00075 ! Laplacian of the density rho
00076      lapRho = 4.D0*( rho(ie,j ) + rho(iw,j ) + rho(i ,jn) + rho(i ,js) )       &
00077             + rho(ie,jn) + rho(ie,js) + rho(iw,jn) + rho(iw,js) - 20.D0*rho(i,j)
00078 
00079 ! Chemical potential
00080      psi(i,j) = beta4*( rho(i,j) - rhoStar )*( rho(i,j) - rhoL )*( rho(i,j) - rhoH ) &
00081               - kappa_6*lapRho
00082 
00083    END DO
00084  END DO
00085 
00086 
00087 !--------- Velocity calculation ------------------------------------------------
00088  DO j = ymin, ymax
00089    DO i = xmin, xmax
00090 
00091    invrho = 1.D0/rho(i,j)
00092 
00093 ! Identify neighbor cells
00094      ie = ni(i,j,1)
00095      jn = ni(i,j,2)
00096      iw = ni(i,j,3)
00097      js = ni(i,j,4)
00098 
00099 ! Gradient of the density gradient squared (1/12 factor embedded in kappaEf)
00100      gradRhoSqX = 4.D0*( gradRhoSq(ie,j ) - gradRhoSq(iw,j ) )           &
00101                 + gradRhoSq(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq(iw,jn) + gradRhoSq(ie,js) &
00102                 - gradRhoSq(iw,js)
00103 
00104      gradRhoSqY = 4.D0*( gradRhoSq(i ,jn) - gradRhoSq(i ,js) )           &
00105                 + gradRhoSq(ie,jn) - gradRhoSq(ie,js) + gradRhoSq(iw,jn) &
00106                 - gradRhoSq(iw,js)
00107 
00108 ! Second derivatives of rho
00109      gradRhoXX2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoXX(ie,j ) - gradRhoXX(iw,j ) )           &
00110                 + gradRhoXX(ie,jn) - gradRhoXX(iw,js) + gradRhoXX(ie,js) &
00111                 - gradRhoXX(iw,jn)
00112 
00113      gradRhoXY2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY(i ,jn) - gradRhoXY(i ,js) )           &
00114                 + gradRhoXY(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY(iw,js) + gradRhoXY(iw,jn) &
00115                 - gradRhoXY(ie,js)
00116 
00117      gradRhoYX2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoXY(ie,j ) - gradRhoXY(iw,j ) )           &
00118                 + gradRhoXY(ie,jn) - gradRhoXY(iw,js) + gradRhoXY(ie,js) &
00119                 - gradRhoXY(iw,jn)
00120 
00121      gradRhoYY2 = 4.D0*( gradRhoYY(i ,jn) - gradRhoYY(i ,js) )           &
00122                 + gradRhoYY(ie,jn) - gradRhoYY(iw,js) + gradRhoYY(iw,jn) &
00123                 - gradRhoYY(ie,js)
00124 
00125 ! Velocity calculation (kappaEf = 0.5*kappa*inv12)
00126      u(i,j,1) = invRho*( gbar(i,j,1) - gbar(i,j,3) + gbar(i,j,5) - gbar(i,j,6) &
00127               - gbar(i,j,7) + gbar(i,j,8) + kappaEf*( gradRhoSqX - gradRhoXX2  &
00128               - gradRhoXY2 ) )
00129 
00130      u(i,j,2) = invRho*( gbar(i,j,2) - gbar(i,j,4) + gbar(i,j,5) + gbar(i,j,6) &
00131               - gbar(i,j,7) - gbar(i,j,8) + kappaEf*( gradRhoSqY - gradRhoYX2  &
00132               - gradRhoYY2 ) )
00133 
00134    END DO
00135  END DO
00136 
00137 !--------- Pressure calculation ------------------------------------------------
00138  DO j = ymin, ymax
00139    DO i = xmin, xmax
00140      p(i,j) = Cs_sq*( gbar(i,j,0) + gbar(i,j,1) + gbar(i,j,2) + gbar(i,j,3)       &
00141             + gbar(i,j,4) + gbar(i,j,5) + gbar(i,j,6) + gbar(i,j,7) + gbar(i,j,8) &
00142             + 0.5D0*( u(i,j,1)*gradRhoX(i,j) + u(i,j,2)*gradRhoY(i,j) ) )
00143    END DO
00144  END DO
00145 
00146  RETURN
00147  END SUBROUTINE Hydrodynamics
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:18 2008 for LL-2D-STD by  1.5.6
